Articles.Content: I'm new to modeling KSP parts and I've made a few in practice, but I noticed whenever I attempt to place a part off-center from the model's Point of Origin, it rotates itself to some unknown, obscure angle that can't seem to be easily fixed in the vessel editor. what I want to do, is prevent the automatic rotation because how the part is positioned on my cursor when I select it, is how I want it to be oriented. any ideas?
